body_html:
@carpodaster in that case, it makes sense to create one, apologies! 🙈
we do have the heart logo as an illustrator file I think (link); I can look into making it an svg and pushing it so that whoever is interested in this task can take it :)

@carpodaster in that case, it makes sense to create one, apologies! 🙈

body:
@carpodaster in that case, it makes sense to create one, apologies! 🙈 
we do have the heart logo as an illustrator file I think ([link](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/design/tree/master/logo)); I can look into making it an svg and pushing it so that whoever is interested in this task can take it :)
